messages: 7745adb1bd8df8704f3f993df58bc843 (23:22): Well, is there any way to know what changed between SXCR 43 and 44? Any changelogs available?
d29f7858616789349f2e17f17eaa3395 (23:25): how could I svcadm enable a service with this status?
1aabbeb9175d25089c1337bf5d7ee085 (23:29): why can i not change the rights for /home?
1aabbeb9175d25089c1337bf5d7ee085 (23:30): chmod: WARNUNG: ƒndern von home/ nicht mˆglich
c84247cefeb3a07c65c26753231e17f7 (23:32): /home is under control of the automounter
c84247cefeb3a07c65c26753231e17f7 (23:32): /export/home is where to put users homes and let the automounte rhandle putting them into /home
7745adb1bd8df8704f3f993df58bc843 (23:34): But why does useradd still have /home as default?
1aabbeb9175d25089c1337bf5d7ee085 (23:36): i call useradd: useradd -u 1000 -g users -d /home/peter -s /usr/bin/bash peter
1aabbeb9175d25089c1337bf5d7ee085 (23:38): Yamaraj: i have edit the etc/passwd ;)
d29f7858616789349f2e17f17eaa3395 (23:38): I usually disable the automounter and use /home :P
d29f7858616789349f2e17f17eaa3395 (23:39): and I'm NOT a linux user :P
4f77072af13b0113165e4da71b7a9fdf (23:39): if all you want is a desktop, sure :p
4f77072af13b0113165e4da71b7a9fdf (23:40): but why not play along with it? maybe you'll learn something and find out it could be very valuable
d29f7858616789349f2e17f17eaa3395 (23:41): heh, I still don't have an home nfs/pr0n fileserver =)
d29f7858616789349f2e17f17eaa3395 (23:41): but I'll have one soon >:P
1aabbeb9175d25089c1337bf5d7ee085 (23:42): have you other links about hints and howtos for solaris?
53e86cb71746c2a78d3aaf322da11ffc (23:56): CigarMan: using the official docs? wouldn't that be cheating? ;)
94ece629302b8d297aacee2baaf20ac0 (00:00): docs.sun.com is cool, but if u want some quick and dirty solution without diging for hours...
53e86cb71746c2a78d3aaf322da11ffc (00:01): coffman: then use the search feature
94ece629302b8d297aacee2baaf20ac0 (00:02): other problem is that the man pages and docs in such good and clean style written, that if u come from the oss u feel kind of lost :)
53e86cb71746c2a78d3aaf322da11ffc (00:02): CigarMan: seems like a very bad choice
7745adb1bd8df8704f3f993df58bc843 (00:03): Is there any way to get Solaris docs in electronic format for offline usage? Individual PDF download is something I try to avoid.
012887c86387803826423b3aa38f1cb5 (00:03): True about that..I am at the point of tossing out my old Sol8 books ,myself...
94ece629302b8d297aacee2baaf20ac0 (00:05): i touched 8 or 9 only for doing firmware updates or so :)
94ece629302b8d297aacee2baaf20ac0 (00:05): never did a real install of it
53e86cb71746c2a78d3aaf322da11ffc (00:06): Solaris 10 System Administration Exam Prep 2 - is another option for quickly catching up on command syntax
94ece629302b8d297aacee2baaf20ac0 (00:10): i did the trip from windows to linux to freebsd to dragonfly and now solaris 10 :)
94ece629302b8d297aacee2baaf20ac0 (00:11): shity is that i have to still support linux/windows
